> NVMe Web Hosting Plans in Singapore

Some awesome features **included in all plans**:-

✅NVMe Disks + ECC RAM
✅**Webserver**: LiteSpeed for better security & performance
✅Free WordPress CDN + SSL Certificates
✅Enterprise CloudLinux operating system
✅Softaculous auto-installer - install Wordpress, joomla & 350+ other apps
✅Fully Whitelable Nameservers
✅Directadmin Control Panel
✅Dual IPv4 + IPv6 support
✅Daily Backups -view & restore backups at will


What's more ? - **included in all plans**
✅**Multiple PHP Versions** available - php selector + Extensions Selector
✅Support **NodeJS & Python** apps
✅**SSH Access** - create a ticket to enable.
✅Generous System Resource limits
✅**Website Builder** app
✅A 99.9% website Uptime Guarantee :)

<br>
**Performance Plans**🚀


> **NVMe Shared-1G SG** 
> 1GB NVMe Disk
> 10 Domains, unlimited Subdomains/pointers
> Unlimited Bandwidth
> SSH Access
> [Order now $5.5 per year](https://my.webhorizon.in/order/config/index/ssd-shared/?group_id=15&pricing_id=202)
<br>

> **NVMe Shared-5G SG** 
> 5GB NVMe Disk
> Unlimited Bandwidth

> SSH Access
> [Order now $15 per year](https://my.webhorizon.in/order/config/index/ssd-shared/?group_id=15&pricing_id=203)

**Getting started** 💰 - Upgrade as your requirements grow

All Singapore Web Hosting plans: https://my.webhorizon.in/order/main/packages/ssd-shared/?group_id=15
